definition[0]: to wear special clothes for fun, or to put special clothes on someone
example[0]: He went to the party dressed up as a Chicago gangster.
example[1]: I keep a box of old clothes for the children to dress up in.
example[2]: We dressed him up as a gorilla.
definition[1]: to wear clothes that are more formal than the ones you would usually wear
example[3]: It’s a small informal party – you don’t have to dress up.
definition[2]: to make something more interesting or attractive
example[4]: It was the old offer dressed up as something new.
